main event: One round, white object, 15 inches long, very high and bright, was observed moving rapidly and erratically before disappearing.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 5 minutes., The object disappeared and reappeared six times., The object's course was westward., The object was surrounded by white vapor resembling steam., Possible explanations for the sighting include balloon, satellite, aircraft, astronomical phenomena, or ground light reflection from haze layer.
witness description: observer at home when the object was sighted
